SEARCH
Package game.utils.sound

Interface SoundInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
SoundFX
public interface SoundInterface
The SoundInterface defines the methods for various sound actions in the game. Implementing classes should provide the specific sound effects for these actions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    attack1()
    Plays the sound for the first type of attack.
    void
    attack2()
    Plays the sound for the second type of attack.
    void
    attack3()
    Plays the sound for the third type of attack.
    void
    death()
    Plays the sound for a WalkerFrame's death.
    void
    fall()
    Plays the sound for a WalkerFrame falling.
    void
    hit()
    Plays the sound for a WalkerFrame getting hit.
    void
    jump()
    Plays the sound for a WalkerFrame jumping.
    void
    run()
    Plays the sound for a WalkerFrame running.
